title.rendered: David, project director for Entrepose Contracting

content.rendered:
Achieving excellence

David Castelli works on the Yamal liquefied natural gas project in Russia, which is challenging since it is located above the Arctic Circle. He works uninterruptedly at the site for six weeks and then has three weeks off. He coordinates works and logistics and oversees 200 French and local employees.

excerpt.rendered: David Castelli works on the Yamal liquefied natural gas project in Russia
